title: New: BLACK HONEY – The Taste (Demo)
body:
Whatsapp savy **BLACK HONEY** continue their assault of ‘demos’ with new track, _The Taste_.

Another grungey, 90’s sounding number, chuck a Gallagher brother on lead vocals, and you’d have a Brit-pop classic on your hands, albeit slightly heavier. Check out The Taste below, and drop them a text on +447578533359.

excerpt.full: Whatsapp savy BLACK HONEY continue their assault of ‘demos’ with new track, The Taste. Another grungey, 90’s sounding number, chuck a Gallagher brother on lead vocals, and you’d have a Brit-pop classic on your hands, albeit slightly heavier. Check out The Taste below, and drop them a text on +447578533359.
